name: Untangle Inc
tag_list: untangle, social, media, adveriting, branding, promotion, campaign, pr
overview:
HnyB Untangle is an agency fuelled by passion to create brands which are loved by people and is driven by smart thinking. HnyB UnTangle engage Social Branding opportunities with innovative solutions crafted to produce measurable results.

HnyB UnTangle’s brand of creative strategic solutions are defined by our people, our processes, our network and exhaustive experience of our team.

We call ourselves UnTangle as we provide ideas, which when incorporated in your products, services and brands, makes your message simple and easily lovable. We make it happen via our Social Branding, Social Advertising, Social PR and Social Marketing solutions.

We ideate and implement actionable solutions derived from the right balance of your business goals, consumer engagement, and short and long term objectives using our brand of tools including Creative Visualization, User Experience Design and Engagement Lifecycle Management.

We believe Brands are like people, having unique personalities and interact similarly in the marketplace. We create dynamic identities for our clients that resonate with consumers across all media formats.

HnyB Untangle offers campaign management and technology for the big four channels:Search, Social, Mobile and Web-TV.

We Believe in Building Brands which People not only Love but also Believe in.
